FuncDef:
The country command sets the country code of the entity.
The undo country command deletes the country code of the entity.
By default, no country code exists for the entity.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the country code of the entity.
The country code and can be queried in ISO3166. For example, CN is the legitimate country code of China, and US is the legitimate country code of the USA.
It is a string of two characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
country-code is used to describe an entity.
